TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit TypeLoadException extends System.SystemException implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
type TypeLoadException = class inherit SystemException interface ISerializable

summary.span: 当发生类型加载失败时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when type-loading failures occur.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时找不到程序集，该程序集中的类型，或无法加载该类型时引发。 is thrown when the common language runtime cannot find the assembly, the type within the assembly, or cannot load the type. 属性包含可帮助你确定异常的原因的更多详细的信息。The property contains more detailed information that can help you identify the cause of the exception. 使用 HRESULT COR_E_TYPELOAD，具有 0x80131522 的值。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_TYPELOAD, that has the value 0x80131522. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructors.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化为系统提供的消息的描述错误，如"失败时出现加载类型。"的新实例的属性This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "A failure has occurred while loading a type." 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||本地化的错误消息字符串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

span.span: The message that describes the error.

summary.span: 用指定的错误消息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容`message`参数应为用户所理解。The content of the `message` parameter should be understandable to the user. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示构造函数。The following code example demonstrates the constructor. 它包含生成的方法与自定义消息，并显示到控制台的错误消息。It contains a method that generates a with a custom message, and displays the error message to the console. summary.span: 用序列化数据初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md). ## Examples 下面的示例将生成异常，和序列化到文件中，异常数据，然后重新设立该异常。The following example generates an exception, and serializes the exception data to a file, and then reconstitutes the exception. 若要运行此代码示例，你必须提供完全限定程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). [!code-cpp[TypeLoadException_GetObjectData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeLoadException_GetObjectData/CPP/typeloadexception_getobjectdata.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TypeLoadException_GetObjectData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeLoadException_GetObjectData/CS/typeloadexception_getobjectdata.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TypeLoadException_GetObjectData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeLoadException_GetObjectData/VB/typeloadexception_getobjectdata.vb#1)]

Public Sub New (message As String, inner As Exception)

param.name: message
param.span: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: inner

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 inner 参数不为 ，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 块中引发。

span.span: If the inner parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常可以在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception can include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||内部异常引用。The inner exception reference.| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示构造函数。The following code example demonstrates the constructor. 它包含生成的方法，捕获该异常，并引发一个新提供自定义消息，包括原始作为内部异常。It contains a method that generates a , catches that exception, and throws a new with a custom message, including the original as the inner exception. [!code-cpp[TypeLoadException_Constructor3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeLoadException_Constructor3/CPP/typeloadexception_constructor3.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TypeLoadException_Constructor3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeLoadException_Constructor3/CS/typeloadexception_constructor3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TypeLoadException_Constructor3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeLoadException_Constructor3/VB/typeloadexception_constructor3.vb#1)]

span.span: Sets the object with the class name, method name, resource ID, and additional exception information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用针对于序列化的所有异常对象数据设置 。 sets a with all the exception object data targeted for serialization. 在反序列化期间的异常对象重建从通过流传输。During deserialization, the exception object is reconstituted from the transmitted over the stream. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md). ## Examples [Visual Basic、 C#][Visual Basic, C#] 下面的示例将生成异常，和序列化到文件中，异常数据，然后重新设立该异常。The following example generates an exception, and serializes the exception data to a file, and then reconstitutes the exception. 若要运行此代码示例，你必须提供完全限定程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). [!code-cpp[TypeLoadException_GetObjectData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeLoadException_GetObjectData/CPP/typeloadexception_getobjectdata.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TypeLoadException_GetObjectData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeLoadException_GetObjectData/CS/typeloadexception_getobjectdata.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TypeLoadException_GetObjectData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeLoadException_GetObjectData/VB/typeloadexception_getobjectdata.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Message As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Message { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取此异常的错误消息。

span.span: Gets the error message for this exception.
The error message string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性将替代。This property overrides . 应本地化的错误消息。The error message should be localized. 此属性是只读的。This property is read-only. ## Examples 下面的示例尝试从 mscorlib 程序集加载不存在类型。The following example attempts to load a non-existent type from the mscorlib assembly. 捕获了生成的异常，和和显示值。The resulting exception is caught, and the and values are displayed. 若要运行此代码示例，你必须提供完全限定程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). summary.span: 获取导致异常的完全限定的类型名称。

span.span: Gets the fully qualified name of the type that causes the exception.
The fully qualified type name.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例尝试从 mscorlib 程序集加载不存在类型。The following example attempts to load a non-existent type from the mscorlib assembly. 捕获了生成的异常，和和显示值。The resulting exception is caught, and the and values are displayed. 若要运行此代码示例，你必须提供完全限定程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). [!code-cpp[TypeLoadException_TypeName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeLoadException_TypeName/CPP/typeloadexception_typename.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TypeLoadException_TypeName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeLoadException_TypeName/CS/typeloadexception_typename.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TypeLoadException_TypeName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeLoadException_TypeName/VB/typeloadexception_typename.vb#1)]

span.para: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的属性。此属性是只读的。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's property. This property is read-only.
